cause.description:
"It has been suggested that fellatio may have a beneficial role in preventing dangerous complications during pregnancy. Specifically, a research group reported that pre-eclampsia, a life threatening complication that sometimes arises in pregnancy, is much less frequent in couples who have practiced oral sex, and even more rare in couples where fellatio ended with the semen swallowed." ~wikipedia(fellatio)
1. Uniting to save the world
cause.mission: Unite the world one head at a time
cause.name: Head Foundation
